Description: Up for auction is this Gretsch Streamliner 2655t. The spruce center block performs 2 functions. 1st this allows playing at higher volumes/gain than if this was a full hollowbody. 2nd this strengthens the center line allowing both the Bigsby B50 tremolo and roller bridge to be securely mounted Most guitars I collect. I also improve upon its weak points. Improve its quality. I have replaced the Grover cloned tuners. (No Grover engraving). And replaced them with Hipshot open gear locking tuners. Also I replaced the Broad Tron neck pick up with TV Jones outstanding "Classic" pick up..Much improvement to the fidelity possible in the neck position. I have scuffed up the neck a bit as I can't stand sticky heavily lacquered necks. 1 master volume on lower horn. 1 master tone and 2 volumes, 3 way switching. Red wine stained maple laminated body. Mahogany set-neck, rosewood 12" radius fretboard with square pearloid fretboard markers Looks, sounds and plays great. Fender gig bag included.
Title: GRETSCH G2655T STREAMLINER™ SPRUCE CENTER BLOCK,TV JONES NECK P/U HIPSHOT TUNERS
